website_summaries.verdict: Great basic Irish coffee mug choice for something simple yet functional. We love the simple design, making the mugs perfect for entertaining.
pros: Mugs are microwave and dishwasher safe and highly durable
Their simplistic design complements any taste
Each mug has a 10 ounce capacity and is just below 6 inches in height
cons: Although it’s very subtle and difficult to see, glassware design does possess visible seams

customer_reviews.title: Not 10oz.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glass mugs because they were advertised to hold 10oz. To my surprise they are only 9oz. Your probably saying one ounce is no big deal, but when you make a Keurig Gevalia Caramel Macchiato or Swill Miss Hot Chocolate, the water alone is 8oz. and the powder flavoring overflows the 9oz. cup. 10oz. would definitely work. Returning them tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Goobeys

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic. The glass is thick enough that it will keep the drink nice and warm. But just thin enough for you to feel that nice heat that test you your drink is still fresh. The seams on the glass are clean. There were no surprise bubbles in the glass and it all arrived on time. Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase. Price was a little high for 4 mugs but worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At the Price, These Are Hard to Beat
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice looking mug for Hot Toddies and other warm cocktails and these are the ones I found. They look fantastic and feel really nice in the hand. I wanted something that wasn't double-walled/vacuum-insulated because feeling the temperature of the drink on the hands is part of the experience. These look premium enough that they add a hint of class to whatever you're drinking too. For the price, these are great. I will add that I only hand-wash these. I'm not sure why other reviewers' mugs break (I'm sure some shipping issues are part of it; shipping glass is always dangerous), but I always recommend washing by hand if you'd like to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hot chocolate on Christmas with my little granddaughters. They are a very nice size. The girls liked them, they felt like 'big people'. I was surprized by the actual weight of them. I was afraid they might be thin and break easily if clunked together but they are actually very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Office Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for irishcoffee
customer_reviews.text: These were great for Irish coffee at the end of my St Patty’s day dinner. I ordered late but they came on time -no breakerages-and just the perfect size. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miggie

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are for no reason too heavy and very fuggy and not clear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great thickness very durable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. My husband makes his coffee in the morning and even brings these pretty, thick glasses to his car when he is in a rush to go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Zahorniak

customer_reviews.title: All scratched on the inside.
customer_reviews.text: All 4 mugs had scratches on the inside about an inch above the handle. I believe these are rejects.

customer_reviews.title: Have a Cuppa!

customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what i was looking for (years), was matching to the 1 i had left, they are perfect. Thank you for packing them so well, they didnt break for overseas postage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.....
customer_reviews.text: Got these awhile back, thought I'd just say I am pleased. Very nice, thick gassware for that warm drink.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Great, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look & happy with the quality, but I wish they were larger. When I make a standard size cup of coffee with my Ninja Coffee Bar, it fills to the rim. I mean, to the very rim where it looks like one more drop with cause a spill-over & there is no room to add cream. I'm still happy with them, but they would be perfect if slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb w.

customer_reviews.title: Good option If you don’t care about volume accuracy
customer_reviews.text: It clearly is not 10 oz. It is almost 9 oz on the brink. I don’t understand how manufacturers are able to blatantly specify an inaccurate, printed label on their product packaging and get away with it. Truth does not matter anymore, which is a little disconcerting. Inaccurate labeling and claim of manufacturers should not be tolerated. It starts with trivial matters. These mugs are clearly not 10 oz not unless you include almost a couple of oz of spill.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: Broken after less than 10 uses. I only use these for aesthetics for when i dress up coffee or hot chocolate. I dont use them often and they seemed to hold up fine until now. It busted and leaked everywhere after filling it halfway with Coffee. Normal temp coffee not super heated. I used it twice today first time was fine second time getting coffee it happened. Cracked all the way down and split nearly in half partially along the seams and down to the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mia_chiqui16

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for gifts
customer_reviews.text: I pair them with mason jars with a home made hot cocoa or loose tea mix, in a nice tin or cloth gift bag with a pretty tea towel to cover (instead of tissue paper) for a zero waste gift. Sometimes adding a stainless steel tea strainer spoon, or spoon straw. Always a hit, Christmas, birthdays, new moms, bride to be, and more!
customer_reviews.author: PureWishing

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are only 8 ounce capacity NOT 10 ounces as shown in the Amazon site, very disappointed consumer. I will keep them because they are pretty and comfortable to drink my 8 oz teas... I just have to walk gingerly when the mug is full... tha's why I wanted a 10oz mug!
customer_reviews.author: Hugonutz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for Irish coffee mugs

product_meta.title: Arc International Luminarc Irish Footed Mug, 10-Ounce, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Before being able to certify their benefits, before advertising them with a pictogram on their packaging, Luminarc products undergo all sorts of excessive treatment. All the tableware goes through the 'quality qualification laboratory' where all kinds of control and testing instruments designed to replicate daily use are available. Controls are also in place at each step of the manufacturing process in order to intervene on the production line, as early as possible to ensure optimum quality, purity and safety.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
